description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Easy to learn, challenging to master, Ball Lightning is the first title in the "simple.fun" campaign series.  Test your reflexes and your wits across seven increasingly difficult levels in this arcade-style platformer from Amalgamation Softworks.  Collect power-ups, avoid traps and other obstacles, rescue your wizard, and escape the dungeon!
